data.title: Ricci Martin, the youngest son of Dean Martin, passes away
data.meta_description: Ricci Martin, the youngest son of Dean Martin, passes away
data.text:
Dean Martin’s son, Ricci Martin, died last week.

The 62-year-old was the legendary entertainer’s youngest son. He died at his home in Utah. A cause of death hasn’t been announced, according to the New York Post.

Martin was a member of the band Dino since the 1990s. He took the place of his late brother Dean Paul Martin. He also toured as a tribute act, singing his father’s songs and telling stories about the late member of the Rat Pack.

in 2002, Martin wrote a memoir about growing up in Beverly Hills as a member of the Martin family, called “That’s Amore.”

Martin is survived by three daughters, his mother Jeanne Martin, and five siblings.

Tony Hicks writes celebrity commentary for the Bay Area News Group. Contact him at Facebook.com/BayAreaNewsGroup.TonyHicks or Twitter.com/tonyhicks67
